name: @huggingface/doc-internal
description: Package to generate doc for other @huggingface packages

scripts.start: pnpm doc-hub && pnpm doc-inference && cp ../../README.md ../../docs/index.md && pnpm update-toc && pnpm fix-md-links
scripts.prepublish-hub: pnpm doc-hub && cp ../../README.md ../../docs/index.md && pnpm update-toc && pnpm fix-md-links
scripts.prepublish-inference: pnpm doc-inference && cp ../../README.md ../../docs/index.md && pnpm update-toc && pnpm fix-md-links
